## IWebSocket.send() method

Transmits data using the WebSocket connection. data can be a string, a Blob, an ArrayBuffer, or an ArrayBufferView.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
send(data: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
